plot: During the filming of a short, the pretentious and tyrannical director drives his inexperienced female star mad, having her mocking partner actor as witness.
title: À poil!
plot_es: During the filming of a short, the pretentious and tyrannical director drives his inexperienced female star mad, having her mocking partner actor as witness.
plot_en: During the filming of a short, the pretentious and tyrannical director drives his inexperienced female star mad, having her mocking partner actor as witness.
